div.div: Energy, climate change and background questions asked on multiple iterations of the New Hampshire Granite State Poll (GSP) and northeast Oregon Communities and Forests in Oregon (CAFOR) surveys over 2010 or 2011 to 2018; on two iterations of the nationwide POLES survey in 2016; and on the one-time North Country survey in 2017.
div.p: Shown with codes used for logit regression analyses in Table 3. Order of response choices for renew and climate were rotated across interviews.
